help.title: Reseller Assignment
help.information: Any Customer has to be assigned to a specific Reseller, so that XAMS is able to map the Resellers-Quotas to his Customers resp. the Resellers-Quota can be reduced by the sum of all Customer/Site-Quotas.

section.head: Reseller
section.description: Here a Reseller has to be selected to which the Customer should belong to.
